snippet: A special session of the Toronto City Council removed Mayor Rob Ford’s power to appoint some city officials, after he admitted using crack cocaine and binge drinking.
abstract: Toronto City Council holds special session to strip powers from Mayor Rob Ford, who is self-confessed crack cocaine user, binge drinker and impaired driver, after he refused to step down.
lead_paragraph: A special session of the Toronto City Council removed Mayor Rob Ford’s power to appoint some city officials, after he admitted using crack cocaine and binge drinking.
